subject: MDGK
title: Beg Md Gk I
info: speaking and reading demotic greek. pattern-practice drill, simple readings, some grammar.

subject: MDGK
title: Beg Md Gk II
info: speaking and reading demotic greek. pattern-practice drill, simple readings, some grammar.

subject: MDGK
title: Inter Md Gk I
info: review the fundamentals of syntax through  various readings from modern greek prose writers and poets. provides additional grammatical elements which are reinforced through reading, conversation, and composition.

subject: MDGK
title: Inter Md Gk II
info: review the fundamentals of syntax through various readings from modern greek prose writers and poets. provides additional grammatical elements which are reinforced through reading, conversation, and composition.

subject: MDGK
title: Advanced Modern Greek 1
info: communication skills, grammar, vocabulary building. readings in a variety of styles. film, field trips followed by discussion. writing, oral presentations, exercises.

subject: MDGK
title: Advanced Modern Greek 2
info: communication skills, grammar, vocabulary building. readings in a variety of styles. film, field trips followed by discussion. writing, oral presentations, exercises.

subject: MDGK
title: Directed Study
info:
guided individual reading or study.  
prereq instr consent, dept consent, college consent.
